Wait, maybe the Second Lake Photo (16) shows that the figure wasn't Edgeworth. Alternatively, the Autopsy Report (3) might indicate the time of death conflicting with when Edgeworth was on the boat. But the testimony is about seeing him, not the time. The key contradiction is visual evidence against her claim. So the best bet is the Second Lake Photo (16) showing someone else. Therefore, Evidence 16 contradicts Testimony 0.
